'''Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop''' is a location in [[Nod-Krai]], [[Snezhnaya]].

The craftshop was originally started by a certain prodigy to research the "World's Best Krumkake Machine." Over time, it gained a new identity as a famous machine craftshop due to the prodigy's many other intricate creations.<ref>[[Song of the Welkin Moon]]</ref>

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*A {{W|Krumkake|krumkake}} is a Norwegian cookie made of flour, butter, eggs, sugar, and cream.
